meanings.definition: The quality of being lifeless or inert.
meanings.sent1: The deadness of the rock made it impossible to skip across the water.
meanings.sent2: The puppet's deadness was eerie as it sat motionless on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The deadness of the computer screen indicated a loss of power.
meanings.sent4: The deadness of the atmosphere in the room made it feel like time had stopped.
meanings.sent5: The deadness of the painting gave it an almost haunting quality.
